user.title: Utility Meters Vision Monitor
user.description: Configure the connection to your InfluxDB instance where meter readings are stored.

data_description.influxdb_url: The URL of your InfluxDB instance (e.g., http://localhost:8086)
data_description.influxdb_token: Authentication token with read access to the bucket
data_description.influxdb_bucket: The bucket where meter readings are stored
data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll for new data (10-3600 seconds)
data_description.camera_tag: Optional identifier for the camera source

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to InfluxDB. Please check the URL and ensure InfluxDB is running.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication. Please check your token and organization name.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This InfluxDB instance is already configured. Please use a different URL or bucket.
